name: Submit Patients
title: Bundled Resource Submission - Patient
description:
Submit a Bundle of Patient resources which will be registered with the DPC application in a single Batch.

This operation is designed to support initial on-boarding of Organizations.

parameter.name: resource
parameter.documentation: Bundle resource to submit to DPC application. This should be the body of the POST request

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: Bundle resource of newly created Patient resources.
